translation:
To be seen with the great — Antônio Casas

Most Illustrious Sir

Herewith I send to Your Excellency Most Illustrious Sir Dom Antônio Casas the sum of 945 pesos, which have been paid, as evidenced by the receipt issued in said order; which I beseech Your Honor, Tribunal of the Treasury, to please have paid to me by the Collectory of this town, it being proper.

God keep Your Excellency  
Bagé, February 9, 1839.  
Joaquim Pereira Fagundes

To citizen Serafim dos Anjos França. General Inspector of the National Public Treasury.
